# transcribedTextContent

**Instance Property**

A string that represents the text the system transcribed.

## Declaration

```swift
var transcribedTextContent: String? { get set }
```

## Describing Apple Intelligence prioritization and summarization

- **isPriority**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the mail or messages content represents a prioritized item.
- **textContentSummary**: A string that presents the Apple Intelligence summarization of the item.
